00022 /* \file MessageStream.h Provides a base class for streaming messages from a component to its calling function. */
00023 
00024 #ifndef _MessageStream_HEADER_
00025 #define _MessageStream_HEADER_
00026 
00027 #include <string>
00028 
00030 class MessageStream
00031 {
00032 protected:
00034         int verbosity;
00035 
00036 public:
00037 
00039         MessageStream() { verbosity = 0; }
00040 
00041   virtual ~MessageStream() { }
00042 
00047         void SetLevel(int level) { verbosity = level; }
00048 
00053         int GetLevel() const { return verbosity;}
00054 
00059         virtual void Write(int level, const std::string &msg) = 0;
00060 };
